observation: Helio | Sell more with crypto  ⚡️  We're in Dubai for Solana Hacker House (April 15-16) & Token2049 (April 18-19)! Solutions Resources About us Launch app Sell more with crypto We help thousands of merchants & creators increase online sales with single-step crypto payments Start selling 98.09% Transaction success rate 99.99% Historical Helio uptime +5,000 Sellers +300,000 Unique Active Wallets Trusted by the best Helio provides a robust Solana-native payments system that seamlessly integrates with web2 solutions. Helio powered USDC ticket sales for Breakpoint 2022 alongside Stripe to offer attendees an option to purchase tickets with USDC on Solana, bringing web3 payments into parity with credit card payments Austin Federa Head of Strategy, Solana Foundation We’re thrilled to welcome Helio to the Polygon ecosystem. Web3 businesses need great payment tools to drive sales and save developer resources they would otherwise spend on building it themselves. It’s exciting to see that merchants can now accept payments using any token on Polygon. Hamzah Khan Head of DeFi at Polygon Labs We worked with Helio to pre-sell half of our supply of 4,000 NFTs before our launch on OpenSea’s Eth launchpad, letting us incentivise & reward the earliest supporters in our community. The ability to create custom pre-sale links with wallet allow lists as well as gate based on Discord roles ensured that the allocation ended up in the hands of the right members Karma Head of Marketing, ZTX We did 20m+ in @solanamobile @Shopify @solana Thanks http://hel.io Toly @aeyakovenko Co-founder Solana Labs Simple & Powerful payment tools Pay Links Start selling in under two minutes. Spin up a hosted checkout page for digital and physical products. Receive payments in any digital currency worldwide, instantly. E-Commerce NFTs Helio Checkout Integrate crypto payments into any website or app with our user-friendly, embeddable widget using just a few lines of code. NFT Pre-sales Launch a Pre-Sales campaign for your NFT, token, or product. Use Discord gating, wallet allowlists, raffles, and more to optimise sales. Integrations Helio integrates seamlessly with other platforms including Discord, YouTube, Twitch, TradingView, WooCommerce and Shopify. Discord tradingview Subscriptions Quickly set up recurring payments for your community memberships, SaaS subscriptions, digital content. Video paywall Sell access to your videos. Let fans unlock their favourite content with a single click of their wallet. PAYWALL helio wallet A self-custody wallet created for you behind the scenes. Accept credit, debit, and bank payments. No crypto or existing wallet is required for customers. Your One-Stop Web3 Payment Solution Multi-chain Accept USDC & 100s of digital currencies on Solana, Bitcoin, Ethereum & Polygon. All-in-One From storefront to settlement, supercharge your sales with Helio. Maximum Engagement Include access to your Discord community and foster loyalty with each sale. Completely Decentralised Receive payments directly from buyers. No intermediaries, no chargebacks. No sign ups Streamline your customer’s journey with one-click checkouts. Instant & borderless Helio guarantees instant payouts wherever you are in the world. Get started with Helio today Reach a growing market of shoppers who prefer the ease of paying with digital currency. talk to us view pricing Join us Media kit FAQ © 2024 Helio Fintech Ltd · All rights reserved · Contact us at: hi@hel.io Privacy Terms

thought: The content suggests that Helio is a payment solutions provider focusing on integrating cryptocurrency transactions for merchants and creators. It doesn't seem to exhibit the typical characteristics of a scam website in the text. However, I should verify the legitimacy of the company and the claims made on the website.

thought: The WHOIS information indicates that the domain hel.io is legitimately registered to Helio Fintech Ltd, with a history dating back to 2013 and an expiration date in 2025. The domain status is "clientTransferProhibited," which is a common status indicating that the domain cannot be transferred without owner approval. This adds credibility to the website. The privacy protection for the registrant details is normal and does not necessarily indicate a scam. Given the consistency in the company's representation across the website, search results, and WHOIS information, there are no obvious signs of a scam. However, I would like to check the security of the website to ensure that it is safe for users.

thought: The retrieved certificate information shows that the domain has a valid SSL certificate from Let's Encrypt, a reputable certificate authority. The certificates for 'auth0.hel.io' and 'auth0.dev.hel.io' are both valid and have been recently issued. The use of SSL certificates suggests that the website is taking steps to secure communications, which is a positive sign and not typical of scam websites. Given the consistency of the company's representation, the active status of the domain, the legitimate registration information, the presence of valid SSL certificates, and the lack of scam indicators from the website's content and WHOIS data, there are no substantial indications to suggest that https://www.hel.io/ is a scam website. I now know the final answer. The URL https://www.hel.io/ does not appear to be a scam website.
